name: Sex Simulator - Futanari BDSM
description:
An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition graphics and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an experienced Futanari Dominatrix who initiates three curious women into the world of BDSM sex.

If you enjoyed our Sex Simulator - BDSM series, you’ll like this one even more.

The story continues with a hot and experienced Futanari Dom who will do anything to satisfy her submissive’s needs, in the privacy of her own luxurious dungeon.

The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until everybody’s satisfied.
